mensaje.confirmar_eliminar_familia: Deleting this family will remove it from all other families that contain it. Do you confirm this operation?

exception.nombre_vacio: The family name cannot be empty.
exception.nombre_repetido: The family name cannot be the same as another family.
exception.permiso_ya_asignado: The permission is already assigned to the family.
exception.permiso_ya_asignado_en_familia: The permission is already assigned in a family that contains this family.
exception.familia_ya_asignada: The family is already assigned to the base family.
exception.familia_tiene_permiso: The family to add contains permissions already assigned to the base family.
exception.permiso_no_seleccionado: You must select a permission to assign.
exception.familiabase_no_seleccionada: You must select a family in "base family".
exception.familiaagregada_no_seleccionada: You must select a family in "family to add".
exception.debe_seleccionar_familia: You must select a family, not a permission.
exception.familia_base_misma_familia_agregada: The family to add cannot be the same as the base family.
exception.familiaagregada_tiene_familiabase: The family to add cannot contain the base family.
exception.permiso_repetido_entre_familias:
The operation cannot be performed because it would duplicate components already contained in other families.
Family/ies:
exception.seleccionar_familia_simple: You cannot select a child family for this operation.
exception.componentebase_no_seleccionado: You must select a component of a family in "base family".
